text: River Edge is a town in Bergen County, New Jersey. The population was 12,049 as of 2020. Earlier, it was called Riverside. In 1930, its name was changed to River Edge.Snyder, John P. The Story of New Jersey's Civil Boundaries: 1606-1968, Bureau of Geology and Topography; Trenton, New Jersey; 1969. p. 85. Accessed January 26, 2012. == References == Category:Towns in New Jersey Category:Settlements in Bergen County, New Jersey
title: River Edge, New Jersey
